As someone so fascinated by physics simulation, whose younger self found himself fascinated by the old browser flash games where you got to build your little world in a box pixel by pixel, this game is what it means to become god of your world. I have not seen a better implementation of magic and alchemy as deep and as intuitive as this game (looking at you skyrim, you really made me lose faith). When the trailer says "every pixel", they do literaly mean every pixel. Not only the fire particles, but the smoke particles as well. Not only that, but the smallest of particles that you can spot being emitted are simulated and can be dynamically changed. I'm not going to ruin you with spoilers, but there are mods that unbound some of the in-game rules making the whole experience 10x more chaotic, but also show the true reach of the game.

My advice is, watch a spoilerless tutorial on wands, and just go. If you die 20 times, it's normal, and no you don't need to find yourself guides. Explore. Unlike minecraft you can dig straight down, but you still got 3 other directions to explore. Pace yourself, and enjoy the chaos.
